sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons atteint le sommet de la montagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We climbed to the top of the mountain.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hěn bàoqiàn ràng nǐ jiǔ děng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis désolé de t'avoir fait attendre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm sorry for keeping you waiting.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Est-ce que ça marche comme ça ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is it okay to do it this way?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yī pán chǎofàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donnez-moi une assiette de riz sauté, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me a plate of fried rice.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一个关于爱情的故事。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè guānyú àiqíng de gùshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une histoire d'amour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a story about love.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les résultats du match sont sortis.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The results of the match are out.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这种水果的特点是很甜。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng shuǐguǒ de tèdiǎn shì hěn tián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La caractéristique de ce fruit est qu'il est très sucré.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The characteristic of this fruit is that it's very sweet.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux porter plainte contre ce service.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to complain about this service.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te souhaite un bon voyage !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Have a pleasant trip!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais demander un jour de congé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to take a day off.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个城市的交通很方便。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège chéngshì de jiāotōng hěn fāngbiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les transports dans cette ville sont très pratiques.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Transportation in this city is very convenient.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La vie est précieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Life is precious.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 警察正在调查这个案件。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La police enquête sur cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The police are investigating this case.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè yánzhòng de wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un problème grave.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a serious problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家店营业到晚上十点。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn yíngyè dào wǎnshang shí diǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce magasin est ouvert jusqu'à 22 heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This store is open until 10 PM.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu hěn qiáng de gōngzuò nénglì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a de grandes capacités de travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has strong work abilities.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis vraiment trop fatigué.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm really too tired.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们生活在一个复杂的社会。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen shēnghuó zài yī gè fùzá de shèhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous vivons dans une société complexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We live in a complex society.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a beaucoup de biens.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a lot of assets.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez d'abord vous inscrire à la réception.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please register at the front desk first.
